overview:
90-220 kW (120-300 HP)COMBINATION POWER HARROW - PNEUMATIC  SEED DRILL FOR CEREALS (cereals-rape)
Пневматическая сеялка ALITALIA предлагается с различной рабочей шириной от 3 до 4 м. Эта профессиональная машина разработана для субподрядчиков и крупных сельскохозяйственных предприятий. Соединение QUICK-MATCH™ с комбинированными боронами Maschio позволяет осуществлять простую и быструю сцепку. Распределитель Gaspardo, управляемый системой GENIUS, делает машину пригодной для различных условий посева с помощью нескольких простых и быстрых операций и постоянного контроля с водительского места.
std: PTO shaft with cam clutch (1” 3/8 Z6 tractor side yoke)
Heavy duty gear-tray with double reinforcement
Universal three point hitch, cat. II^ versions 3000-3500
Universal three point hitch, cat. III^ versions 4000-4500
Rear levelling bar with mechanical central adjuster installed on the roller
Rear levelling bar with mechanical central adjuster installed on the roller
Pneumatic seed drill with centralized distributor and pneumatic delivery
Electric dosing - isobus GENIUS MASTER system
Centralized hydraulic tensioning of the sowing bar
Hopper with window for seed level check
Quick hitch for MASCHIO power harrow
Hydraulic distributors required from tractor: from 2 to 3 [87]
G1000, F25-125 and N500 dosing rollers for seed
double staggered big disc (370 mm of diameter) with integrated internal steel scraper and heavy duty sealed hub
opposite staggered design on front and rear ranks prevent from drifting working on slopes
320x3” rear wheels to set seeding depth and to improve seed-soil contact
parallelogram unit guarantees great vertical excursion (+ 14 cm from the zero)
the two ranks are 585 mm spaced to prevent from clogging working on heavy and muddy soils or at high speed
even seeding depth control from 0 to 8 cm can be easily adjusted
centralized seeding bar down pressure adjustment can be set while working
